title: Darius was buffed too much...
body: As the title says...Darius now is a retarded champion, a braindead champion to be specific, he deals too much dmg and he is too tanky and has nothing to lose for building tanky, in other words he is a mother fucking russian tank that steamrolls over and through everything even if he lost his lane...and its incredibly hard to keep a lane against him, for example i played rumble against him on top lane , killed him 4 times and he killed me once, but to kill him we had to be atleast 2 every time to assure the kill, despite him getting killed 4 times it didnt matter, it didnt make my lane easyer at all, and in the mid game he was just unstopable , dealing huge ammounts of dmg, and got about 9 kills when we reached lategame, at that point he was simply an unstopable killing machine...you just overpowered a champion for no reason, he was already strong....oh and morde too , but thats for another topic.
